page.title: 09TYPICAL SCHOOL DAY
page.content: {SCHOOL} I get up at ten to seven and when we get up we have a bath and get dressed. I have my breakfast. I get my wee brother dressed. I have to leave my brother to the{Nursery.}I have about five minutes to get into the playground. We get into rows when the bell rings. All schools have books, pens, pencils, stages, and rubbers. If you do a mistake you will have to rub it out without making a mark. But do not lean on it hard because it will break. {SUBJECTS} Maths, Comprehension, Spelling, Religion, Georaphy, Science, S.R.A, handwriting. In school there are a lot of lessons and lots of homework. There are ten lessons and two for homework and sometimes even no homework at all. In maths we get Primary Mathematics.
